alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 26 at 5:04AM CST until January 26 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Carlton and South St. Louis County. In Wisconsin, Ashland, Bayfield, Douglas, and Iron Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the northwestern area of the Lac du Flambeau Band, the Fond du Lac Band, the Bad River Reservation and the Red Cliff Band. Recreation spots such as Madeline Island and the Apostle Islands National Lakeshore. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights and fog lights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
